title: Coinband.io
author: Coinband.io
content: Coinband - advertising agency for promotion of Web3 projects (Crypto, NFT, GameFi, DeFi, DAO, Exchange, Token) At the moment we are promoting 20+ projects with total capitalization >$1 billion.One of our advantages:We have 250+ Influencers and 100+ Media who are proven in practice and show great results in promoting our projects. And also, with most of them, we have exclusive terms on the cost of placement, cheaper by 15-40% from other offers in the market. Our services:1. social media marketing2. Community Management3. Influencer Marketing4. PR in media5. Paid Ads6. SEOApply on our website: https://coinband.io/ and we'll prepare a proposal to promote your project!
